title: Accelerated Learning Course in International Law Based on Video Conferencing

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of international private law and understanding of domestic legal systems
context.additional_context: 30-minute focused sessions in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, utilizing VR simulation tools for case analysis and real-time feedback

learning_goals: Analyze international judicial dispute cases to propose jurisdiction and applicable law implementation strategies
Solve real-world case procedures with 80% accuracy using simulation problems provided in video conferencing tools
Demonstrate core concept comprehension by achieving at least 75 points on formative assessments per learning cycle

resources: Access to international judicial precedent database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
